subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Scott Pruett has driven modified Mustangs and Mazdas and prototypes from Jaguar and Ford that go 200 miles per hour, but he has found his niche in endurance racing and will seek a record sixth victory in this weekend’s Rolex 24.
snippet: Scott Pruett has driven modified Mustangs and Mazdas and prototypes from Jaguar and Ford that go 200 miles per hour, but he has found his niche in endurance racing and will seek a record sixth victory in this weekend’s Rolex 24.
